import React from 'react'; const TourBuddyTerms = () => { return (

Terms and Conditions for Guides

THIS DOCUMENT IS AN ELECTRONIC RECORD IN TERMS OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ACT, 2000 AND RULES THEREUNDER AS APPLICABLE AND THE PROVISIONS PERTAINING TO ELECTRONIC RECORDS IN VARIOUS STATUTES AS AMENDED BY THE INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ACT, 2000.

Voyease Solutions (Voyease / Company / us, we or our) provides technology-based services and acts as an intermediary for facilitating: (i) the booking of tour guides in real time or in advance to offer guide services (Guide Services) offered by third party Tour Guides (Tour Guides). (Guide Services are collectively referred to as Services) and other support services (such as associated payment collection, third party cab booking) as offered by Voyease from time to time by means of the Companys website and the mobile application Voyease (collectively, Platform).

The Services are provided / offered by third party Tour Guides who wish to offer such Services through the Platform (Tour Guide(s) / you).

On the basis of the representations and warranties provided by the Tour Guide, the Company has agreed to list them on the Platform and to enable the Tour Guides to provide the Services through the Platform in accordance with the terms and conditions as hereinafter provided and any other policy or agreement or document made applicable / executed by you for the purpose of the provision of Services (collectively, T&Cs).

These T&Cs will govern the relationship between you and the Company in the course of provision of the Services. By signing up or registering on the Platform and offering to provide one or more of the Services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these T&Cs and agree to be bound by these T&Cs, without any limitation or qualification. If you do not agree with these T&Cs, please do not sign-up or register on the Platform or offer any Services.

Use of and access to the Platform is offered to you upon the unconditional acceptance of all the terms, conditions and notices contained in these T&Cs and Privacy Policy (which is incorporated herein by reference), along with any amendments made by the Company at its sole discretion and posted on the Platform from time to time.

These T&Cs expressly supersede prior agreements or arrangements with you.

General Covenants

In relation to your access of the Platform to provide the Services, you covenant and agree to the following:

  • For the purposes of registration/creation of an account on the Platform and providing the Services, you confirm that you are 18 years of age.
  • The Tour Guide, when on duty, shall always wear the laminated guide license issued by the Ministry of Tourism and also wear the name tag while accompanying tourists.
  • The Tour Guide would not solicit tips from tourists.
  • The Tour Guide would dress in a presentable manner to uphold the dignity and honor of the profession to which he/she belongs and of the country.
  • The Tour Guide would maintain good conduct and courteous behavior towards tourists or other officials with whom he/she comes in contact during the course of his/her assignment.
  • The Tour Guide would abide by the existing rules and any other rules and conditions that may be framed from time to time by the Ministry of Tourism and the Archaeological Survey of India.
  • The Tour Guide shall abide by the provisions of Ancient Monuments and Archaeological Sites & Remains Act (AM & ASR) Act 1958 and Rules 1959.
  • The Tour Guide shall abide by the instructions given by the site in charge or field staff while taking a round in the ASI Monument premises.
  • The Tour Guide shall ensure entry in the register kept at the ASI monument while taking visitors to that particular monument.
  • You are not restricted by any legal, regulatory, judicial, quasi-judicial, or other authority, to access the Platform or provide the Services, including to enter into transactions contemplated using the Services.
  • You will provide the Services solely as permitted and in accordance with these T&Cs and in accordance with applicable laws.
  • By using the Platform and offering the Services, you authorize Voyease, whether directly or indirectly through third parties, to collect information about you or make any inquiries necessary to validate your identity including conduct police verification and background checks, in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
  • When you provide any Information to Voyease, you will provide only true, accurate, current, and complete Information.
  • You understand and acknowledge that the responsibility to provide correct Information, including the contact information, bank account details, etc., as required in connection with the Services, lies solely with you.
  • You must take all caution to ensure that there are no mistakes and errors in the Information you provide.
  • We will not be responsible to verify the accuracy of the Information provided by you.
  • These T&Cs impose valid and legally binding obligations on you and are enforceable against you.

Registration on and Operation of the Platform

To offer the Services on the Platform, you should be eligible as per the onboarding criteria and provide such documents as requested by Voyease as per applicable law and Voyeases internal policies and ensure continued compliance with the same. Particularly, you represent, warrant, and covenant to Voyease that:

  • You have at least 2 years of Tour Guide experience;
  • No proceeding is pending against you regarding and neither have been convicted of (a) any cognizable offence under the Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Samhita, 2024, including fraud, sexual offences, use of a motor vehicle to commit cognizable offence, or of any crime involving property damage, theft, acts of violence, or acts of terror, in the past 3 years;
  • You must register on the Platform and create an account on the Platform (Your Account) by providing accurate Information as sought during the registration process.

Further, we may ask you for Information or documents that will allow us, whether directly or indirectly through third parties, to reasonably identify you, requiring you to take steps to confirm your right over your email address or financial instruments, or verifying your information against third party databases or through other sources. We reserve the right to terminate, suspend, or limit access to the Platform in the event we are unable to obtain or verify this Information.

You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials (username, password, etc.) provided upon registration by you, and the Company is not liable for any loss you may incur as a result of someone else using Your Account, either with or without your knowledge.

You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur in or from Your Account and agree to establish reasonable security procedures and controls to limit access to the password or other identifying information of Your Account to unauthorized individuals, which includes choosing passwords and other credentials in a manner that will protect the security of your Information. Your credentials include your username and password to Your Account and to any third-party account you have used to log in to Your Account.

You agree to inform us immediately if you have any reason to believe that your login credentials have become known to anyone else, or if the password is being or is likely to be used in any unauthorized manner.

Voyease will not be liable for any breach of security or unauthorized use of Your Account.

The Company will take the booking request of the customer made on the Platform (Service Request) and forward it to you through the Platform, or in such other manner based on Voyeases sole discretion, and the Tour Guide is prohibited from accepting an order through street hailing or other means while using the Platform.

The Company reserves the right to approve or reject any Service Request made through the Platform based on its internal criteria, without any obligation to provide any reasons for such rejection.

Payment and Commissions

The Company will collect the entire payment from the customer and will pay the Tour Guide the applicable remuneration based on the Services rendered in accordance with the Companys remuneration policy, at the time as specified by the Company.

For the Services rendered by the Tour Guide, Voyease shall be entitled to a commission, as notified to you from time to time.

Liability and Indemnity

You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Voyease and its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, agents, representatives, and service providers (the Indemnified Parties) from and against any and all claims, liabilities, damages, losses, costs, and expenses, including, without limitation, reasonable attorneys fees, arising out of or in connection with:

  • your breach of these T&Cs;
  • your violation of any applicable law or regulation;
  • your violation of any rights of a third party, including, without limitation, any intellectual property rights; and/or
  • your use of the Services.

Governing Law and Dispute Resolution

These T&Cs shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising out of or relating to these T&Cs shall be resolved through arbitration in accordance with the rules of the Indian Council of Arbitration.

Modifications to the Terms

Voyease reserves the right, at its discretion, to change, modify, add, or remove portions of these T&Cs at any time. It is your responsibility to review these T&Cs periodically for updates. Your continued use of the Platform after the posting of changes will mean that you accept and agree to the changes.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at: support@voyease.com.

Terms and Conditions for Guides

THIS DOCUMENT IS AN ELECTRONIC RECORD IN TERMS OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ACT, 2000 AND RULES THEREUNDER AS APPLICABLE AND THE PROVISIONS PERTAINING TO ELECTRONIC RECORDS IN VARIOUS STATUTES AS AMENDED BY THE INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ACT, 2000.

Voyease Solutions (Voyease / Company / us, we or our) provides technology-based services and acts as an intermediary for facilitating: (i) the booking of tour guides in real time or in advance to offer guide services (Guide Services) offered by third party Tour Guides (Tour Guides). (Guide Services are collectively referred to as Services) and other support services (such as associated payment collection, third party cab booking) as offered by Voyease from time to time by means of the Companys website and the mobile application Voyease (collectively, Platform).

The Services are provided / offered by third party Tour Guides who wish to offer such Services through the Platform (Tour Guide(s) / you).

On the basis of the representations and warranties provided by the Tour Guide, the Company has agreed to list them on the Platform and to enable the Tour Guides to provide the Services through the Platform in accordance with the terms and conditions as hereinafter provided and any other policy or agreement or document made applicable / executed by you for the purpose of the provision of Services (collectively, T&Cs).

These T&Cs will govern the relationship between you and the Company in the course of provision of the Services. By signing up or registering on the Platform and offering to provide one or more of the Services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these T&Cs and agree to be bound by these T&Cs, without any limitation or qualification. If you do not agree with these T&Cs, please do not sign-up or register on the Platform or offer any Services.

Use of and access to the Platform is offered to you upon the unconditional acceptance of all the terms, conditions and notices contained in these T&Cs and Privacy Policy (which is incorporated herein by reference), along with any amendments made by the Company at its sole discretion and posted on the Platform from time to time.

These T&Cs expressly supersede prior agreements or arrangements with you.

General Covenants

In relation to your access of the Platform to provide the Services, you covenant and agree to the following:

  • For the purposes of registration/creation of an account on the Platform and providing the Services, you confirm that you are 18 years of age.
  • The Tour Guide, when on duty, shall always wear the laminated guide license issued by the Ministry of Tourism and also wear the name tag while accompanying tourists.
  • The Tour Guide would not solicit tips from tourists.
  • The Tour Guide would dress in a presentable manner to uphold the dignity and honor of the profession to which he/she belongs and of the country.
  • The Tour Guide would maintain good conduct and courteous behavior towards tourists or other officials with whom he/she comes in contact during the course of his/her assignment.
  • The Tour Guide would abide by the existing rules and any other rules and conditions that may be framed from time to time by the Ministry of Tourism and the Archaeological Survey of India.
  • The Tour Guide shall abide by the provisions of Ancient Monuments and Archaeological Sites & Remains Act (AM & ASR) Act 1958 and Rules 1959.
  • The Tour Guide shall abide by the instructions given by the site in charge or field staff while taking a round in the ASI Monument premises.
  • The Tour Guide shall ensure entry in the register kept at the ASI monument while taking visitors to that particular monument.
  • You are not restricted by any legal, regulatory, judicial, quasi-judicial, or other authority, to access the Platform or provide the Services, including to enter into transactions contemplated using the Services.
  • You will provide the Services solely as permitted and in accordance with these T&Cs and in accordance with applicable laws.
  • By using the Platform and offering the Services, you authorize Voyease, whether directly or indirectly through third parties, to collect information about you or make any inquiries necessary to validate your identity including conduct police verification and background checks, in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
  • When you provide any Information to Voyease, you will provide only true, accurate, current, and complete Information.
  • You understand and acknowledge that the responsibility to provide correct Information, including the contact information, bank account details, etc., as required in connection with the Services, lies solely with you.
  • You must take all caution to ensure that there are no mistakes and errors in the Information you provide.
  • We will not be responsible to verify the accuracy of the Information provided by you.
  • These T&Cs impose valid and legally binding obligations on you and are enforceable against you.

Registration on and Operation of the Platform

To offer the Services on the Platform, you should be eligible as per the onboarding criteria and provide such documents as requested by Voyease as per applicable law and Voyeases internal policies and ensure continued compliance with the same. Particularly, you represent, warrant, and covenant to Voyease that:

  • You have at least 2 years of Tour Guide experience;
  • No proceeding is pending against you regarding and neither have been convicted of (a) any cognizable offence under the Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Samhita, 2024, including fraud, sexual offences, use of a motor vehicle to commit cognizable offence, or of any crime involving property damage, theft, acts of violence, or acts of terror, in the past 3 years;
  • You must register on the Platform and create an account on the Platform (Your Account) by providing accurate Information as sought during the registration process.

Further, we may ask you for Information or documents that will allow us, whether directly or indirectly through third parties, to reasonably identify you, requiring you to take steps to confirm your right over your email address or financial instruments, or verifying your information against third party databases or through other sources. We reserve the right to terminate, suspend, or limit access to the Platform in the event we are unable to obtain or verify this Information.

You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials (username, password, etc.) provided upon registration by you, and the Company is not liable for any loss you may incur as a result of someone else using Your Account, either with or without your knowledge.

You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur in or from Your Account and agree to establish reasonable security procedures and controls to limit access to the password or other identifying information of Your Account to unauthorized individuals, which includes choosing passwords and other credentials in a manner that will protect the security of your Information. Your credentials include your username and password to Your Account and to any third-party account you have used to log in to Your Account.

You agree to inform us immediately if you have any reason to believe that your login credentials have become known to anyone else, or if the password is being or is likely to be used in any unauthorized manner.

Voyease will not be liable for any breach of security or unauthorized use of Your Account.

The Company will take the booking request of the customer made on the Platform (Service Request) and forward it to you through the Platform, or in such other manner based on Voyeases sole discretion, and the Tour Guide is prohibited from accepting an order through street hailing or other means while using the Platform.

The Company reserves the right to suspend or terminate your Account, or restrict access to the Services on the Platform for any reason, including without limitation the following reasons:

  • If you provide any false, inaccurate, or misleading Information;
  • If you fail to comply with these T&Cs or any other agreements with the Company;
  • If you engage in any conduct that the Company believes is detrimental to the Services.

If you want to terminate your account, please contact us by email. Please note that in case of account termination, you may lose access to your account and all associated Information.

Services

You agree to provide Services and act in a professional manner. You agree that:

  • You will arrive on time at the meeting point to offer the Services and you shall ensure that the meeting point is conveyed clearly to the customer.
  • You will offer the Services at the agreed time and in the manner agreed upon.
  • You will not take additional customers if you are on a booking.
  • You will maintain a professional demeanor and address customer complaints promptly.
  • You will not use any unauthorized devices or means to communicate with customers.

You agree to provide the Services and ensure the customer is satisfied. The customer is entitled to the following:

  • The customer is entitled to receive timely and adequate responses to any questions or complaints regarding the Services.
  • The customer is entitled to a service that is fit for purpose and meets the standard expected by a reasonable person.
  • YOUR CONDUCT
    1. The Tour Guide will not reject Service Request(s) from a customer, except when deemed absolutely necessary and/or under exceptional circumstances, as deemed acceptable by Voyease at its sole discretion. In case of repeated or consistent denial of Service Requests, Voyease reserves the right to take appropriate action including suspension or permanent deactivation of Your Account and termination of these T&Cs.
    2. The Tour Guide will refrain from doing anything which the Company reasonably believes to be disreputable or capable of damaging the Companys reputation and will comply with all applicable laws of the Republic of India.
    3. In relation to the Platform, the Tour Guide agrees to:
      1. Not authorize others to use Your Account on the Platform or your License;
      2. Not assign or otherwise transfer Your Account to any other person or legal entity;
      3. Not use the Platform for unlawful purposes, including but not limited to sending or storing any unlawful material or for fraudulent purposes;
      4. Not use the Platform to cause nuisance, annoyance, or inconvenience to customer, Voyease, or any other person;
      5. Not consume alcohol or drugs or be under the influence of drugs or other illegal substances, prior to or during the provision of Services. Voyease has a zero-tolerance policy in respect of the use of drugs, alcohol, intoxicants, or other illegal substances, by any Tour Guide, and the customers can report any such behavior to Voyease. Strict action will be taken by Voyease including but not limited to suspension of your Services/Your Account while under investigation and termination;
      6. Not impair the proper operation of the network/ Platform and will not use any device, software, routine, file, or other tool or technology, which includes any viruses, trojan horses, worms, time bombs, or cancelbots, intended to damage, interfere with or affect functionality or operation of the Platform, to surreptitiously intercept or expropriate any system, data, or information in connection with the content hosted/available on the Platform, or to affect the operation of any other websites or the internet;
      7. Not take any action that imposes an unreasonable or disproportionately large load on the infrastructure associated with the Platform, including but not limited to denial-of-service attacks, spam or any other such unsolicited overload technique;
      8. Not try to harm the Platform in any way whatsoever;
      9. Not copy, or distribute any content on the Platform without written permission from the Company; and
      10. Not use the Platform with an incompatible or unauthorized device.
    4. In addition to the foregoing, you will not upload, display, share, host, publish, or transmit any information that:
      1. Either belongs to another person or to which you do not have any right whatsoever;
      2. Is harmful, offensive, harassing, obscene, pornographic, invasive of anothers privacy, hateful, racially, or ethnically objectionable, disparaging, relating to or encouraging money laundering or gambling, or an online game that causes user harm, or otherwise unlawful in any manner whatsoever, or promoting enmity between different groups on the grounds of religion or caste with the intent to incite violence;
      3. Infringes any patent, trademark, copyright, or any other proprietary rights;
      4. Harms minors in any way or is harmful to children;
      5. Includes any commercial material or content (including solicitation of funds, advertising, or marketing of any goods or services);
      6. Deceives or misleads the addressee about the origin of such messages, or communicates any misinformation or information which is patently false and untrue or misleading in nature or in respect of any business of the Central Government, is identified as fake or false or misleading by such fact check unit specified by the Government;
      7. Impersonates another person;
      8. Contains software viruses or any other computer code, files, or programs designed to interrupt, destroy, or limit the functionality of any computer resource;
      9. Threatens the unity, integrity, defence, security, or sovereignty of India, friendly relations with foreign states, or public order or causes incitement to the commission of any cognizable offence or prevents investigation of any offence or is insulting any other nation;
      10. Is in the nature of an online game that is not verified as a permissible online game;
      11. Is in the nature of advertisement or surrogate advertisement or promotion of an online game that is not a permissible online game, or of any online gaming intermediary offering such an online game; or
      12. Violates any law for the time being in force.
    5. The Company reserves the right to immediately terminate the use of the Platform by the Tour Guide if they do not comply with any of the above rules in Clauses III.3 and III.4 above.
    6. The Tour Guide will not be permitted to operate on the Platform for more than 12 hours on a calendar day and should take a mandatory break of 10 hours before subsequent login into the Platform and offering the Services.
    7. The Tour Guide consents to provide identity documents for police verification and background checks by the Company, directly or indirectly through a third party appointed by the Company.
    8. The Tour Guide will have to mandatorily undergo an induction training program of 30 hours before onboarding with the Voyease Platform and agrees to undergo any other training programs including a refresher training program as required by applicable law or as deemed necessary by Voyease.
    9. Voyease / its personnel may undertake spot checks of the License to verify and ensure your compliance with these T&Cs and applicable laws.
  • PAYMENT TERMS
    1. The Company has the discretion to charge any such fees from the Tour Guide as updated on the Platform from time to time and will be subject to applicable taxes.
    2. The Company charges a convenience fee from the customers for facilitating the Services through the Platform.
    3. The Tour Guide authorizes the Company to collect the service/travel fee (Fare) from the customers on behalf of the Tour Guides.
    4. If the Fare is collected in cash by the Tour Guide from the customer, the convenience fee component of the Fare that is due to Voyease by the customers, for providing the Platform and associated services to the customers, will be adjusted against amounts due to be settled with the Tour Guides by Voyease.
  • REPRESENTATIONS, WARRANTIES AND COVENANTS

    1. The Tour Guides and the Company represent the following:

      1. They have all requisite power and authority to deliver and perform the obligations imposed herein;
      2. The execution and performance of the obligations do not and will not violate any provision of any existing agreement, law, rule, regulation, any order, or judicial pronouncement which is applicable to each party; and
      3. They have not been convicted by any court in India or any other country of any crimes including but not limited to involving moral turpitude.

    2. The Tour Guides hereby represent, warrant, and covenant the following:

      1. They have the requisite authority or assignment to become a tour guide and there are no restrictions with respect to the use of the Guide License that will hinder the Tour Guide from the performance of the Services or using the Platform;
      2. They have all rights, licenses, and permits as may be required under applicable laws to perform the Service in accordance with these T&Cs;
      3. At the time of onboarding with the Platform, they have not been convicted within the past 3 years, for the offence of driving under the influence of alcohol or any cognizable offence under the Bhartiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita, 2024 or the Bhartiya Nyaya Sanhita, 2024 (as may be applicable) including fraud, sexual offences, use of a motor vehicle to commit a cognizable offence, a crime involving property damage or theft, acts of violence, or acts of terror;
      4. They hold and will maintain updated/renewed licenses, insurance, and permits necessary;
      5. They will provide the Services in a courteous and professional manner as reasonably expected by a service provider providing the Services;
      6. They will at all times during which they are undertaking the Services, maintain dress, appearance, and hygiene codes reasonably expected from a service provider;
      7. They will perform their obligations with promptness and use reasonable care and skill and in accordance with standards of diligence, care, skill, quality, and integrity to be reasonably expected of an experienced and reputable provider of Services;
      8. They will provide Services in accordance with all the specifications that may be prescribed and formulated by the Company from time to time;
      9. They will follow all the standard operating procedures (SOPs) and policies that may be prescribed and formulated by the Company from time to time;
      10. They will not carry any weapons, firearms, ammunition, explosive devices, and dangerous substances during the performance of the Services;
      11. They will not seek any extra monetary compensation from the customer for the completion of Services by way of tips or otherwise;
      12. They will not commit any fraud while providing the Services or otherwise commit any act or omission, to gain any undue advantage which may include, but not be limited to:
        1. Intentionally falsify information;
        2. Accept Service Requests without the intention to complete or provide the Services;
        3. Provoke customers to cancel for fraudulent purposes;
        4. Claim fraudulent fees or charges;
        5. Intentionally request, accept, or complete fraudulent or falsified Service Requests;
        6. Deliberately increase the time or cost of a journey;
        7. Actions intended to disrupt or manipulate the normal functioning of the Companys Platform, including manipulating the settings on a phone to prevent the proper functioning of the Platform and the GPS system;
        8. Falsify documents, records, or other data for fraudulent purposes;
        9. Creating improper duplicate accounts;
        10. Falsify documents, records, or other data for fraudulent purposes;
        11. Any other fraudulent, negligent, or unlawful activity in contravention of the intent of these T&Cs, permitted scope of Services envisaged under these T&Cs, or applicable laws;
      13. They will ensure that the Vehicle has a valid fitness certificate issued, insurance certificate, pollution under control certificate, and other permits/certificates/licenses and will operate under valid and subsisting permit(s) granted under relevant provisions of applicable law;
      14. They will adhere to applicable laws including in relation to road safety, abide by traffic signals, speed limits, and such other norms or rules applicable for plying the Vehicle on road;
      15. They will perform each pick-up and delivery in the most efficient manner possible and will make best efforts to adhere to the timelines prescribed;
      16. They will ensure that the safety of packages is not compromised at the time of delivery;
      17. Their total earnings for any given financial year do not exceed INR 20,00,000 (Rupees Twenty Lakhs) and that they are an unregistered GST service provider; and
      18. They will promptly inform the Company in case their total earnings exceed or are expected to exceed INR 20,00,000 (Rupees Twenty Lakhs) in a financial year.
  • RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE PARTIES
    1. Independent Contractor: The Tour Guide will operate as, and have the status of, an independent contractor. The relationship between the Company and the Tour Guide is on a principal-to-principal basis. The Company and the Tour Guide are independent legal entities, and nothing in these T&Cs will be construed to create a partnership, joint venture, an association of persons, agency (disclosed or undisclosed), franchise, sales representative, or employment relationship between the Company and the Tour Guide. It is clarified that the Tour Guide will not have any right to conclude any contract for and/or on behalf of the Company or bind the Company in any manner.
  • TOUR GUIDE INFORMATION
    1. Voyease may collect Tour Guide Information at the time of onboarding of the Tour Guides and from time to time, to establish the identity of the Tour Guides. Voyease reserves the right to store, process, access and use the Tour Guide Information for business purposes and needs, background check, verification, marketing, service, development, analytics, research, and any other purpose as Voyease may deem fit and in accordance with Voyeases Privacy Policy and applicable law. The Tour Guide hereby expressly consents to such collection and use of Tour Guide Information.
    2. Subject to applicable laws, Voyease may provide to a third party, governmental agency, judicial body, any Tour Guide Information, or information relating to the Tour Guide, if there is a complaint, dispute, or conflict, including any accident involving a Tour Guide on one hand and end-consumer, or a third party on the other hand.
    3. Please read our Privacy Policy to understand how we deal/handle Information collected from you.
    4. Tour Guide Information shall mean and include any personal data or Information collected from the Tour Guide including know your customer documents with Tour Guides bank, copies of valid Tour Guide License issued by Government of state or Central Government, mobile number, bank account details, identity proof, self-clicked images (selfies), residence proof, location data and any other Information that Voyease may deem fit.
  • Confidentiality
    1. The Tour Guide will keep confidential all data including customer details, market information, all work products and documents related thereto, and the contents of the Platform and will not sell or otherwise make that information available to any third parties. Except as otherwise agreed, the data of customers will be the exclusive property of the Company, and the Tour Guide will not use the same for any purpose or distribute such data in any form or means except for the purpose of providing the Services and other than as permitted by the Company and will keep it confidential at all times.
    2. All non-public information relating to us or disclosed by us or our affiliates to you that is designated as confidential or that, given the nature of the information or the circumstances surrounding its disclosure, reasonably should be considered as confidential. Confidential information includes but is not limited to:
      1. Contents / information relating to Services and Platform;
      2. Information relating to our or our affiliates or business partners technology, software, customers, business plans, product plans and designs, promotional and marketing activities, finances, and other business affairs;
      3. Third-party information including that of customers which we are obligated to keep confidential;
      4. The nature, content, and existence of any discussions or negotiations between you and us or our affiliates;
      5. Any other information which should be reasonably kept confidential.
    • DISCLAIMERS
      1. THE COMPANY MAKES NO REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY, OR GUARANTEE AS TO THE RELIABILITY, TIMELINESS, QUALITY, SUITABILITY, AVAILABILITY, ACCURACY, OR COMPLETENESS OF THE SERVICES PROVIDED BY Voyease AND/OR THE PLATFORM. THE COMPANY DOES NOT REPRESENT OR WARRANT THAT (A) THE USE OF THE SERVICES PROVIDED BY Voyease AND/OR THE PLATFORM WILL BE SECURE, TIMELY, UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE OR OPERATE IN COMBINATION WITH ANY OTHER HARDWARE, SOFTWARE, SYSTEM OR DATA, (B) THE PLATFORM / SERVICE WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS OR EXPECTATIONS, (C) ANY STORED DATA WILL BE ACCURATE OR RELIABLE, (D) THE QUALITY OF ANY SERVICES, INFORMATION OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE PLATFORM WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS OR EXPECTATIONS, (E) ERRORS OR DEFECTS IN THE SERVICES PROVIDED BY Voyease AND/OR THE PLATFORM WILL BE CORRECTED, OR (F) THE PLATFORM OR THE SERVER(S) ARE FREE OF VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS. THE PLATFORM IS PROVIDED TO YOU STRICTLY ON AN AS IS BASIS.
      2. All conditions, representations, and warranties, whether express, implied, statutory, or otherwise, including, without limitation, any implied warranty of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of third-party rights, are hereby excluded and disclaimed to the highest and maximum extent.
      3. The Platform may be subject to limitations, delays, and other problems inherent in the use of the internet and electronic communications.
      4. Access to the Platform or the Services may be unavailable, delayed, limited, or slowed due to various reasons, including:
        1. Servers, networks, hardware failure, or telecommunication lines issues;
        2. Software failure or viruses;
        3. System overload;
        4. Damage due to natural disasters;
        5. Interruption of power supplies or strikes;
        6. Governmental restrictions or other human intervention;
    • LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
      1. The Company is not liable for the use and access of the Platform.
      2. The Company is not liable for any civil, criminal, or other liability due to the breach of laws by the Tour Guide:
        1. For violating applicable laws;
        2. For failing to comply with transport authority licenses;
        3. For breaching the T&Cs;
        4. For negligence in duty of care.
      3. The Company is not responsible for the actions or quality of the Tour Guide's service.
      4. The Company does not endorse the accuracy of advertisements or materials linked to the Platform.
      5. IN NO EVENT WILL Voyease BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, PUNITIVE, INCIDENTAL, OR SPECIAL DAMAGES.
      6. IN NO EVENT WILL Voyease's AGGREGATE LIABILITY EXCEED INR 1000/-.
    • TERMINATION
      1. The Company can terminate these T&Cs at any time for reasons including:
        1. Any violation of the T&Cs;
        2. Misuse of the Platform;
        3. Non-compliance with applicable laws;
        4. Failure to authenticate information;
        5. Fraudulent or negligent behavior;
      2. Misconduct includes behavior such as:
        1. Rude or criminal behavior;
        2. Concealment of important information;
        3. Poor work performance or attendance;
        4. Drug or alcohol abuse;
        5. Commission of fraud;
        6. Spreading harmful content;
        7. Unauthorized disclosure of Confidential Information;
        8. Misuse of Voyease assets;
    1. The Company may terminate these T&Cs immediately on the above grounds and is not obliged to give notice of the termination of these T&Cs in advance. Voyease or the Tour Guide may terminate these T&Cs by providing 7 days written notice to the other party.
    2. Voyease, in addition to its right to terminate these T&Cs, reserves the right to legally prosecute the Tour Guide immediately if there is reason to believe that the Tour Guide has indulged in any fraudulent activity, contravened the T&Cs of the Platform, or violated any applicable laws. Voyease will not be responsible for any consequences to the Tour Guide arising from the same.
    3. Upon termination:
      1. The Tour Guide will stop accessing the Platform and offering the Services;
      2. Voyease will settle all outstanding dues accrued to the Tour Guide, subject to deductions/set-offs of any amount owed by the Tour Guide to Voyease;
      3. The Tour Guide will return all property and materials, including confidential information belonging to Voyease;
      4. The Tour Guide will cease holding out as a service provider integrated with or connected to Voyease in any manner.
  • GOVERNING LAW, JURISDICTION AND DISPUTE RESOLUTION
    1. These T&Cs will be governed by and interpreted in all respects in accordance with the laws of the Republic of India.
    2. Subject to the provisions made in Clause XIV.3, the parties hereby submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Bangalore, India.
    3. All disputes arising out of or in relation to these T&Cs will be settled amicably by the parties. In the event that no amicable settlement is arrived at within a period of 15 (fifteen) days from the date of first initiation of the dispute by one party to the other, the parties will resolve the dispute by means of arbitration pursuant to the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996.
    4. The arbitration proceedings will be conducted by an arbitral tribunal comprising of 1 arbitrator mutually appointed by you and the Company.
    5. The arbitration proceedings will be conducted in English language only and the seat for arbitration will be Varanasi, India.
    6. The award of the arbitral tribunal will be final and binding.
  • ASSIGNMENT
    1. The Tour Guide may not assign its rights or obligations under these T&Cs without prior written approval of the Company.
    2. The Company may assign any of its rights and obligations to its affiliates or third parties without prior consent or notice.
  • AMENDMENT
    1. These T&Cs may be amended from time to time and as required, at the sole discretion of the Company.
    2. If Voyease makes any changes to these T&Cs that it deems material, Voyease will make a reasonable effort to inform you, but it is your responsibility to review the T&Cs posted on the Platform periodically to see if they have changed.
    3. The updated version of these T&Cs will supersede the current version and will be immediately effective upon being posted on the Platform.
    4. Continued use of the Platform following notification or updates of the T&Cs will be construed as acceptance of the modified T&Cs.
  • SEVERABILITY
    1. If any provision or part of a provision of these T&Cs is invalid, unenforceable, or prohibited by applicable laws of the Republic of India, such provision or part thereof will be severed and deemed divisible from these T&Cs.
    2. Such provision or part will be inoperative, and the remainder of these T&Cs will remain valid and binding as though the severed provision was not included.
  • NOTICES
    1. The Company may provide notice via general communication on the Platform, by email to your registered email address, or by written communication sent by regular mail to your address on record.
    2. Tour Guide must send any notices to the email: TourGuidecare@Voyease.bike.
  • CUSTOMER CARE AND GRIEVANCE REDRESSAL
    1. Any opinions, issues, or suggestions regarding the Platform can be communicated to the customer care number or email mentioned below.
    2. Customer Care: pankaj@voyease.in
    3. Any complaint, dispute, or grievance related to the Services or the Platform should be addressed to Voyease at the contact details below. Such matters will be handled as per applicable laws.
    4. Grievance Officer: Pankaj Sharma
    5. e-mail: pankaj@voyease.in
    6. Address: CK-13/94, Bajrang Katra, Pashupateshwar, Chowk Varanasi - 221001, Uttar Pradesh, India

    TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR BUDDIES

    Voyease Solutions (Voyease/ Company/ us/ we/ our) provides a technology-based platform and acts as a discovery platform for facilitating the booking of tour service facilitators (Tour Buddies) in real time to offer services related to the development of travel itinerary plans, assistance in facilitating hotel and cab bookings (using their own discretion), language translation services, and other travel-related solutions (Tour Services) and other support services as offered by Voyease from time to time by means of the Companys website and the mobile application Voyease App (collectively, Platform).

    The Services are provided/offered by third-party tour service facilitators who wish to offer such Services through the Platform (Tour Buddy / you).

    On the basis of the representations and warranties provided by the Tour Buddy, the Company has agreed to onboard Tour Buddies on the Platform and to enable the Tour Buddies to discover the Users. The Tour Buddy shall act in accordance with the terms and conditions as hereinafter provided and any other policy or agreement or document made applicable/executed by you for the purpose of the provision of the usage of the Platform (collectively, T&Cs). These T&Cs will govern the relationship between you and the Company in the course of provision of the usage of the Platform. By signing up or registering on the Platform, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these T&Cs and agree to be bound by these T&Cs, without any limitation or qualification. If you do not agree with these T&Cs, please do not sign up or register on the Platform.

    These T&Cs expressly supersede prior agreements or arrangements with you. Use of, and access to, the Platform is offered to you upon the unconditional acceptance of all the terms, conditions, and notices contained in these T&Cs and Privacy Policy (which is incorporated herein by reference), along with any amendments made by the Company at its sole discretion and posted on the Platform from time to time.

    These T&Cs expressly supersede prior agreements or arrangements with you.

      4. The Tour Guide hereby expressly consents to such collection and use of Tour Guide Information.

      6. Tour Buddy Information shall mean and include any personal data or Information collected from the Tour Buddy, including know your customer documents, mobile number, bank account details, vehicle insurance copy, driving license, identity proof, residence proof, location data and any other Information that Voyease may deem fit.

By using the Platform, you authorize Voyease, whether directly or indirectly through third parties, to collect information about you including Tour Buddy Information, or make any inquiries necessary to validate your identity including background checks, in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
